TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: All Kerb'd Up - Strong Pins

Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n58d1zC0Qh1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/MJlUD5yJ0tI" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>It’s time for bowling at the space center and Xacktar’s about to roll. He’s got all the asteroids, boosters and heavy machinery he could ask for, but with none of the hassle of having to rent bowling shoes.</p>
Yay for Xacktar! I love all his videos.
Sweet. I think he might need a bigger bowling asteroid next time. Great vid
That was awesome. Now add wings! Or water polo... or catapult! OR BASEBALL.
Just think, when multiplayer is developed in years time.... tennis.
Any one ever tried bowling with kerbals as pins and balls?

Wow! Thanks guys! I hope everyone laughs as much as I do when I'm driving those things.

That was awesome. Now add wings! Or water polo... or catapult! OR BASEBALL.

I already did a catapult... but baseball... That is an interesting thought. The rockets are pretty dang resistant to asteroid-smash... so you COULD build a bat in theory.

*Evil cackling here*

Just think, when multiplayer is developed in years time.... tennis.

I'd be up for a game! Just gimme a few days to build a racket big enough...

Edited May 8, 2014 by Xacktar
Really good video. I think it's time for the Lumpy Space Program to do something similar.
Wow...Danny really started a new genre of KSP videos.
